item.description:
Back by popular demand....wine night at Ralphs house!!! Had so much fun we had to do it again.

Our gracious member Ralph, will once again open his home for a multi group meetup.(Thanks Ralph!!)

For wine night, everyone will bring a bottle of wine (no boxed wine please) AND a pot luck dish, finger food or hors d'oeuvres to share.

If you are coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle of wine that is $15 or more. Couples or groups can go in together on a bottle that is $30 or more, to ensure we have a good assortment of wines to taste.

Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste
testing..
Reds Malbec, Blends, cab, merlot, shiraz pinot noir, whites -
sav blanc, chards, reisling,
pinot grigio, etc

Just post it so we know who wants to partner and who want to buy one alone so we know.

There will be 3 Meetup groups attending, and RSVP's will be limited to 20 from each group...so sign up quick!! This event was very popular last time.

Please ensure you show up if you RSVP yes, since we may have a waiting list and you are taking up a persons spot if you do not show up.

*Please note* The address will be sent a few days prior to the event to all the "yes" RSVPs, due to this being a private residence.

I look forward to a great night...and meeting some new faces.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Wine Tasting
